name: The Man withe the Golden Joystick - Acorn Atom Version
name_original: The Man withe the Golden Joystick - Acorn Atom Version
description:
The ZX Spectrum game, the Man with the Golden Joystick, starring RetroHitch has been converted to the Acorn Atom by the very talented  Kees Van Oss.

Can be played on the Atom emulator " Atomulator" downloadable from here: http://atomulator.acornatom.co.uk

This is a platform game  in the style of the classic 8-bit platformers from back in the day.

The game is free, but if you do play & enjoy it, please consider making a small donation to the mental health charity Safe in our World: https://tiltify.com/@sloanysoft/sloanysoft-safe-in-our-world

You can watch & follow RetroHitch here: www.twitch.tv/retrohitch
